channel.title: Subodh Dahal
channel.description: Personal website and blog of Subodh Dahal

item.title: Fixing my broken Docker Immich+Traefik setup
item.description: Photo indexing and other jobs failed in my Immich+Traefik setup. Turns out I'd misconfigured my Docker networking with Traefik. Here's how I figured it out and what I changed.

item.title: Quickly Outline Large JSON Responses with a Custom jq Function
item.description: Use jq to automatically map and visualize the structure of large JSON responses, perfect for exploring undocumented endpoints.

item.title: Why I added RSS feeds to my blog (and how I did it in Nuxt 3)
item.description: How I built RSS and Atom feed support for my Nuxt 3 website to let readers follow my content without social media algorithms.

item.title: Revisiting my Stream Deck for music control
item.description: How I turned my neglected Stream Deck into a useful tool for controlling YouTube Music without breaking my workflow.

item.title: fzf + fabric: Smart selection for LLM patterns and models
item.description: Enhance your experience with fabric, the AI prompt tool, by using interactive selection for patterns and models.

item.title: Effortless configuration syncing with GNU Stow and Git: A software engineer's workflow
item.description: Discover how to manage and sync configuration files across Linux and macOS using GNU Stow and Git. Simplify your workflow with centralized, version-controlled setups.

item.title: My 2023 travels: A visual journey
item.description: Looking back at the best pictures from my travel adventures in 2023

item.title: Re-living memories through proper media organization
item.description: Organizing media such as photos and videos can bring back cherished memories and help relive them. Here's my approach to organizing my digital media collection.

item.title: Looking back: My 2022 in review
item.description: From new adventures and memories to lessons learned and personal growth, this year has been a year of discovery. Here's my 2022 in review.

item.title: Git and the command-line: Take your workflow to the next level
item.description: Some tips on how to improve your Git productivity using the command-line

item.title: Hiking Tsho-Rolpa lake trail in Nepal
